items.text: no he can't! Full on off, and it's in Powell's arc again. Launches this over long on, and that's another big over from Mustafizur
items.postText: Anupam Raj: "@Mahneel can relate as an Indian.. I remember that Bravo slower one which fixed Yuvi! That one ball changed the course of Chappell era.. we were the fantastic chasers who couldn't recover from it"
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to R Powell, SIX runs

items.text: full on off, and that's been chipped over Powell to long on
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Holder, 1 run

items.text: good length outside off, and flicked off his hips to square leg
items.postText: Opu: "Tough job to hide the emotion after going so near of the victory. Go for a wicket BAN "
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to R Powell, 1 run

items.text: full outside off, and worked away to the leg side with soft hands. But they can collect only a single
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Holder, 1 run

items.text: good length outside off, and Powell uses his wrists to smother this punch to long on for one
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to R Powell, 1 run

items.text: full outside off, but Holder comes down the wicket and slogs across the line. Off the bat's toe end, and lands juuust short of Shakib at deep midwicket
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Holder, 1 run

items.text: good length outside off, but Powell's deceived by the change of pace. Mistimes a punch to long on and gets to fifty!
items.postText: Also the second-fastest fifty by a WI batsman against Bangladesh. The record is held by Brian Charles Lara
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to R Powell, 1 run

items.preText: The senior Bangladesh players join in for a huddle. Shakib looks pretty chill, doing a little dance as he joins the conversation as well. Yep, "Shakib will bowl", says Mashrafe. West Indies need 51 off 24 balls
items.text: overpitched on leg stump, and he muscles a shot to short fine leg for a single. Tried to slog it over midwicket, but couldn't get the optimal connection
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to R Powell, 1 run

items.text: full outside off, and Holder is allowed to free his arms. Swings through the ball's line, but the shot goes to long on on the bounce
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Holder, 1 run

items.text: full on middle, and Powell clears his front leg to slog across the line. Lifts this with the use of his bottom hand, and the ball goes straight into the cow-corner boundary
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to R Powell, FOUR runs

items.preText: Sneh : "@Anupam..That slower one from Bravo still haunts me whenever I watch such late night matches played in Caribbean. Pain of that defeat somehow managed to heal after watching MSD's amazing late night finish in tri series final against SL in 2013. Always love these late night Caribbean thrillers."
items.text: good length on off, and Powell once again makes some room to free his arms. Pulled over to deep midwicket, and a diving effort in the deep may have saved a boundary. But the umpires want to have a second look. Every single run saved counts at this stage.
items.postText: Mir Akib: "Is this gonna be another close lose for Bangladesh. Hope our sacrifice of sleep won't be in vain. Come on Tigers."
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to R Powell, 2 runs

items.text: full on leg stump, and this time the slog goes to deep midwicket on the bounce. Sabbir the man doing the heavy lifting there. Powell's not happy
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to R Powell, 1 run

items.text: full and wide outside off. Holder does well to let it go through. One free run for West Indies
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Holder, 1 wide

items.text: full on leg, and Holder's slog is mistimed to deep backward square leg. Eleven off the over
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Holder, 1 run

items.preText: Fizz with the ball now. Tense faces everywhere as long as Powell and Holder are in the middle.
items.text: full on middle, and he goes for the big shot over extra cover. Can't time it well, and the ball is in the air for ages. Rubel gets under it at long off and does manage to hold on! Sends Holder home.
items.postText:
Sashi Kurucheti: "How can that not be a boundary? Ridiculous! Bowlers and batsmen cannot cross their lines but the fielders can push their??!" -- The umpires did check whether the ball crossed the original boundary line. They deemed that it didn't. Pretty much the end of story thus. At this stage it doesn't matter what we think. Better for WI to move on and look to chase the total down anyway

Deepak: "Uhhh this frustrates me so much, this happened with a debate over a boundary Dhawan in Ct13 final, it's also the foot that's over where the boundary line was when he picks and throws."



Hasan: "Deja vu for Bangladesh! Another Nidahas Trophy final in the making."
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Holder, OUT

dismissal.text: JO Holder c Rubel Hossain b Mustafizur Rahman 9 (10b 0x4 0x6) SR: 90.00

items.text: full on middle, and defended back to Fizz off the front foot
items.postText: Anupam Raj: "@Sneh.. yes bro.. only positive outcome was it gave us our Dada back.. not in blues but in whites.. the beauty of this game.. how a second of brilliance can change course of a story."
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to R Powell, no run

items.preText: Harun: "What a Fantastic game, even I'm a Bangladeshi I have no problem who even win the match;;;; Good luck tigers"
items.text: lucky! An excellent delivery that costs Fizz a boundary. Back of a length outside leg, and Powell tried to nudge it to the leg side. Takes a leading edge, and flies between keeper and gully!
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to R Powell, FOUR runs

items.text: good length ball outside leg stump, and Powell flicks this off his pads to the leg side
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to R Powell, 1 run

items.text: full outside leg stump, and he misses the paddle sweep. Hits the bat's handle and flies away to the off side instead. They appeal for lbw, but the umpire signals runs
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Nurse, 1 run

items.text: good length on leg stump, and Powell misses the leg-side swipe. Hits his front pad, and the lbw appeal is turned down! Looked much closer, but maybe the height saved him. A chance of a run-out as well, as Mushfiqur has a shy at the stumps with Powell outside his crease. But he misses.
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to R Powell, no run

items.preText: West Indies need 34 off 12. Here's Rubel.
items.text: full outside off, and the drive is drilled to the fielder at cover. All the infielders are on the 30-yard circle
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Nurse, 1 run

items.text: knee-high full toss but wide outside off. He swings across the line, and gets a good connection too, but the shot goes to long on on the bounce
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to R Powell, 1 run

items.text: yorker on off, and shoveled to cover. Just a single
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Nurse, 1 run

items.preText: Tanzin: "Rubel in 49th over again!!! Mash got some guts I must say. " -- Three balls to go.
items.text: full outside off, and the slog takes the bat's inside edge! Almost beats the keeper, but Mushfiqur sticks his left hand out and stops the ball. Saves a certain four
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to R Powell, 1 run

items.text: attempted yorker on off stump, and all Nurse can do is thump a drive down to long on
items.postText: Mashrafe comes to have a chat with Rubel before the final ball. Once again, can he finish the over well?
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Nurse, 1 run
